sentences.sentence: Each Quaestio had, in fact, confined itself to the crimes committed to its cognisance by its charter.
sentences.translation: 事实上每一个“审问处”都把自己局限于由其特许状委托给它审判的各种罪行。

sentences.sentence: Corvids' cognisance of other birds has led scientists to ponder whether they are also aware of themselves.
sentences.translation: 乌鸦对其他鸟的认知使得科学家思考：乌鸦会不会认知自己呢？

sentences.sentence: When choosing surface finishes in a food factory, due cognisance must be taken of the type of food being handled and of the type of operations to be carried out in each area of the factory.
sentences.translation: 食物工厂完成，当选择表面完成，必须采取交付认识被处理的食物的种类和的在工厂的各个区域将执行的操作的种类。 这些操作通常包括环境清洁并且对洗涤剂，并且，可能，蒸汽的用途。
